meanings.sent1: The limax slowly crawled across the garden path.
meanings.sent2: I saw a limax in the backyard after the rain.
meanings.sent3: Why did the limax bring an umbrella to the slug race? To avoid a slimy finish!
meanings.sent4: The limax moved as gracefully as a dancer on the wet leaves.
meanings.sent5: The slimy trail left by the limax shimmered in the sunlight.

meanings.definition: A genus of air-breathing land slugs
meanings.sent1: In the science book, there was a picture of a limax from the genus Limax.
meanings.sent2: The limax from the genus Limax is known for its unique breathing mechanism.
meanings.sent3: Why did the limax from the genus Limax refuse to share its lettuce? It was on a diet!
meanings.sent4: The limax from the genus Limax navigated the rocky terrain with ease.
meanings.sent5: The colors on the limax from the genus Limax's body were vibrant and eye-catching.
